variable.name: bcr_patient_barcode
variable.description: The unique identifier for an individual patient(public CDE id 2673794)

variable.name: bcr_radiation_barcode
variable.description: The unique identifier for patients instance of radiation treatment

variable.name: anatomic_treatment_site
variable.description: Text term to describe radiation therapy administration in reference to location of disease (e.g. primary tumor or recurrence). [Manually-curated](public CDE id 2793522)

variable.name: days_to_radiation_treatment_end
variable.description: Days elapsed from date of initial diagnosis to end of radiation treatment

variable.name: days_to_radiation_treatment_start
variable.description: Days elapsed from date of initial diagnosis to start of radiation treatment

variable.name: numfractions
variable.description: The number of fractions of radiation received(public CDE id 61465)

variable.name: radiation_dosage
variable.description: The total dose of radiation therapy administered to an individual expressed as a dosage amount.(public CDE id 2721441)

variable.name: radiation_treatment_ongoing
variable.description: Text term to signify if a subject is still receiving radiation therapy.(public CDE id 2842745)

variable.name: radiation_type
variable.description: Classification for the form of radiation therapy administered to a subject.(public CDE id 2842944)

variable.name: regimen_indication
variable.description: Text term to identify the reason for the administration of a treatment regimen. [Manually-curated](public CDE id 2793511)

variable.name: units
variable.description: A unit of measurement corresponding to a dose of radiation therapy given to a patient.(public CDE id 61446)
